title: Classic Tomato Spaghetti
steps: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
Add spaghetti and cook until al dente.
Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a pan and sauté minced garlic until fragrant.
Add canned tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Season with salt, pepper, and fresh basil.
Toss pasta with the sauce and serve.

title: Grilled Chicken Salad
steps: Season chicken breast with salt, pepper, and olive oil.
Grill chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until cooked through.
Slice the chicken.
Toss mixed greens, halved cherry tomatoes, and sliced cucumber in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Top with grilled chicken and serve.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
steps: Cook rice according to package instructions.
Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat sesame oil in a wok or large pan.
Sauté ginger and garlic until fragrant.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Stir in soy sauce and cook for another minute.
Serve vegetables over rice.

title: Fluffy Pancakes
steps: In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, and baking powder.
Whisk in milk, egg, and melted butter until smooth.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Pour batter onto the pan to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden.
Serve with maple syrup.

title: Mushroom Risotto
steps: Sauté chopped onion and garlic in butter until soft.
Add sliced mushrooms and cook until browned.
Stir in arborio rice and toast for 1 minute.
Pour in white wine and stir until absorbed.
Gradually add warm broth, one ladle at a time, stirring constantly.
Cook until rice is creamy and tender.
Stir in parmesan cheese and serve.

title: Beef Tacos
steps: Cook ground beef in a pan until browned.
Add taco seasoning and simmer for 3 minutes.
Warm tortillas in a skillet.
Fill tortillas with beef, shredded lettuce, and cheese.
Top with sour cream and salsa.

title: Avocado Toast
steps: Toast the bread slices.
Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado on the toast.
Sprinkle with chili flakes and serve.

title: Chicken Fried Rice
steps: Cook and chill rice ahead of time.
Scramble eggs in a hot pan and set aside.
Sauté diced chicken until cooked.
Add vegetables and stir-fry.
Add rice, soy sauce, and egg, then mix well.

title: Caesar Salad
steps: Chop romaine lettuce.
Toss lettuce with croutons and parmesan cheese.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and olive oil.
Season with pepper and serve.

title: Lentil Soup
steps: Heat olive oil and sauté onions, carrots, celery, and garlic.
Add lentils and vegetable broth.
Simmer for 25-30 minutes until lentils are soft.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

title: Banana Smoothie
steps: Add banana, milk, yogurt, and honey to a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Add ice cubes and blend again if desired.

title: Baked Salmon
steps: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F).
Place salmon on a lined baking tray.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt, pepper, and dill.
Bake for 12-15 minutes.
Serve with lemon slices.

title: Veggie Omelette
steps: Whisk eggs with salt and pepper.
Sauté diced vegetables in olive oil.
Pour eggs over vegetables and cook until set.
Add cheese, fold, and serve.

title: Chickpea Curry
steps: Heat oil and sauté onion, garlic, and ginger.
Add curry powder and stir for 1 minute.
Add chickpeas and tomato puree.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 15 minutes.
Season with salt and serve.

title: Garlic Butter Shrimp
steps: Heat butter in a pan.
Sauté minced garlic until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes per side.
Stir in lemon juice and parsley.
Serve immediately.

title: Tomato Basil Soup
steps: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook for 10 minutes.
Pour in vegetable broth and simmer.
Blend until smooth.
Season with salt, pepper, and basil.

title: Fruit Yogurt Parfait
steps: Add a layer of yogurt to a glass.
Top with granola and berries.
Drizzle honey and serve.

title: Caprese Sandwich
steps: Layer bread with sliced mozzarella and tomato.
Add fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Toast if desired and serve.

title: Peanut Butter Oatmeal
steps: Cook oats with milk until thick.
Stir in peanut butter.
Top with sliced banana and honey.

title: Sushi Bowl
steps: Cook rice and season lightly with soy sauce.
Dice salmon, avocado, and cucumber.
Assemble ingredients in a bowl.
Top with nori strips and sesame seeds.

title: Quinoa Kale Salad
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions and let cool.
Chop kale, halve cherry tomatoes and dice cucumber.
Toss quinoa with kale, tomatoes, cucumber, and crumbled feta.
Dress with lemon juice and vinaigrette, toss and serve.

title: Herbed Turkey Meatballs
steps: Mix ground turkey with breadcrumbs, egg, parmesan, minced garlic, and chopped parsley.
Form into meatballs and bake until cooked through.
Warm tomato sauce and simmer meatballs in sauce for 5 minutes.
Serve with pasta or on a bed of greens.

title: Sheet-Roasted Root Vegetables
steps: Preheat oven and chop all root vegetables into uniform pieces.
Toss vegetables with melted butter and fresh herbs.
Spread on a baking sheet and roast until tender and caramelized.
Serve warm as a side.

title: Citrus Shrimp Ceviche
steps: Poach shrimp briefly and chill.
Dice shrimp, onion, tomato, and avocado.
Marinate shrimp with lime juice and chopped cilantro until flavors meld.
Serve chilled with tortilla chips or lettuce cups.

title: Baked Eggplant Parm
steps: Slice eggplant and dip in beaten egg then breadcrumbs.
Bake slices until tender and golden.
Layer eggplant with tomato sauce and cheeses, then bake until cheese melts.
Garnish with fresh basil and serve.

title: Creamy Corn Chowder
steps: Sauté diced onion and celery in butter until soft.
Add diced potato, corn, and broth; simmer until potatoes are tender.
Stir in milk and warm through.
Blend partially for texture if desired and serve.

title: Tofu Breakfast Scramble
steps: Crumble tofu and sauté with diced onion and bell pepper in a non-stick pan.
Add turmeric and nutritional yeast and fold in spinach until wilted.
Serve with toast or wrapped in a tortilla.

title: Greek Yogurt Chicken Wrap
steps: Shred cooked chicken and mix with greek yogurt, diced cucumber, and chopped dill.
Layer mixture on a wrap with lettuce and tomato.
Roll tightly and slice in half to serve.

title: Black Bean Burger
steps: Mash black beans and mix with finely chopped onion, garlic, breadcrumbs, egg, and cumin.
Form patties and cook in a non-stick skillet until heated through and slightly crisp.
Serve on buns with preferred toppings.

title: Honey Garlic Glazed Carrots
steps: Slice carrots and steam or parboil until just tender.
Melt butter in a pan, add minced garlic and cook briefly.
Add carrots and honey, toss to glaze and finish with thyme.
Serve warm.

title: Zucchini Fritters
steps: Grate zucchini and squeeze out excess moisture.
Mix zucchini with flour, beaten egg, chopped scallion, and lemon zest.
Pan-fry spoonfuls until golden on both sides.
Serve warm with a yogurt dip.

title: Mediterranean Chickpea Bowl
steps: Combine chickpeas, diced cucumber, halved cherry tomatoes, and thinly sliced red onion in a bowl.
Crumble feta over the top and sprinkle with oregano.
Toss gently and serve chilled or at room temperature.

title: Spiced Apple Compote
steps: Peel, core, and chop apples.
Simmer apples with brown sugar, cinnamon, lemon juice, and a splash of vanilla until soft and syrupy.
Cool slightly and serve over yogurt or pancakes.

title: Herb-Roasted Cauliflower Steaks
steps: Slice cauliflower into thick steaks.
Brush with a light herb rub of garlic powder and paprika.
Roast until edges caramelize and center is tender.
Garnish with chopped parsley and serve with lemon wedges.

title: Smoked Paprika Lentils
steps: Sauté diced carrot, celery, and onion until softened.
Add lentils, smoked paprika, and tomato paste, then cover with water or broth and simmer until lentils are tender.
Adjust consistency and serve over grains.

title: Mango Coconut Chia Pudding
steps: Mix chia seeds with coconut milk and maple syrup; refrigerate until thickened.
Top with fresh mango puree or diced mango before serving.

title: Soba Noodle Salad with Edamame
steps: Cook and rinse soba noodles under cold water.
Toss noodles with blanched edamame, shredded carrot, and sliced scallion.
Sprinkle with toasted sesame seeds and serve chilled.

title: Cranberry Walnut Quinoa
steps: Cook quinoa and fluff with a fork.
Stir in dried cranberries, chopped walnuts, orange zest, and baby spinach while warm.
Serve as a warm side or light main.

title: Lemongrass Coconut Chicken Soup
steps: Simmer chicken with bruised lemongrass, galangal, and lime leaves until cooked.
Add sliced mushrooms and coconut milk; warm through.
Finish with a squeeze of lime and serve hot.

title: Corn and Basil Polenta
steps: Cook polenta with warm vegetable broth until creamy.
Stir in sweet corn kernels and grated parmesan.
Top with torn fresh basil and serve immediately.

title: Blueberry Almond Overnight Oats
steps: Combine oats, almond milk, chia seeds, and almond butter in a jar.
Top with blueberries and refrigerate overnight.
Stir and enjoy cold or warmed.

title: Herbed Pork Tenderloin
steps: Rub tenderloin with crushed garlic and a smear of mustard, then press with chopped rosemary and thyme.
Roast until internal temperature reaches desired doneness.
Let rest before slicing and serving.

title: Roasted Beet and Goat Cheese Salad
steps: Roast beets until tender, then peel and slice.
Arrange arugula with beet slices, crumbled goat cheese, and chopped walnuts.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze and serve.

title: Pesto Chickpea Flatbread
steps: Spread basil pesto on flatbread base.
Top with chickpeas, chopped artichoke hearts, and shredded mozzarella.
Bake until cheese melts and crust is crisp.

title: Sweet Potato and Black Bean Hash
steps: Dice and cook sweet potato until tender.
Add black beans, diced red bell pepper, and corn; warm through.
Sprinkle with cumin and serve with a dollop of plain yogurt if desired.

title: Peach and Burrata Crostini
steps: Toast baguette slices until crisp.
Top with sliced peach and a spoonful of burrata.
Garnish with torn mint leaves and a light drizzle of honey.

title: Coconut Turmeric Cauliflower Rice
steps: Warm cauliflower rice with turmeric until tender.
Stir in green peas and toasted coconut flakes.
Finish with lime zest and serve hot.

title: Maple Dijon Roasted Carrots
steps: Toss halved carrots with maple syrup, dijon mustard, and thyme.
Roast until caramelized and tender.
Finish with a spritz of lemon juice and serve warm.

title: Blue Cheese Pear Endive Boats
steps: Slice pear thinly and crumble blue cheese.
Arrange pear and cheese in endive leaves and top with toasted pecans.
Drizzle lightly with honey and serve as an appetizer.

title: Miso-Glazed Eggplant
steps: Slice eggplant and score flesh.
Brush with a glaze made from white miso, mirin, and rice vinegar.
Broil or roast until tender and caramelized; top with sliced scallion and serve.
